title: Systematic Training Design: Developing Educational Programs for Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Strengthening individual learning device usage and small-group collaborative learning in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners will be able to design optimal training program strategies based on job performance objectives derived from the analysis phase.
Learners will be able to select and apply appropriate and effective instructional methods for target learners and propose implementation plans.
Learners will be able to develop a cost-effective educational program prototype within a resource-constrained environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
